actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that nothing in House Concurrent Resolution 91 shall be interpreted as providing a pay increase for Members of Congress.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that no provisions of House Concurrent Resolution 91 (the first concurrent resolution on the budget for the 98th Congress) shall be interpreted as providing a pay increase for Members of Congress.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that nothing in House Concurrent Resolution 91 shall be interpreted as providing a pay increase for Members of Congress.
